message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $130.
Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $110 for the product.
Hi Bob, thank you for your latest offer. I'm still not willing to go that low. I'll try to find a middle ground. I'll sell the product to you for $125.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $120 for the product.
